attributes.f90_index_overload: \>INTERFACE MPI\_ALLOC\_MEM \\ \>\>SUBROUTINE MPI\_ALLOC\_MEM(SIZE, INFO, BASEPTR, IERROR) \\ \>\>\>IMPORT :: MPI\_ADDRESS\_KIND \\ \>\>\>INTEGER :: INFO, IERROR \\ \>\>\>INTEGER(KIND=MPI\_ADDRESS\_KIND) :: SIZE, BASEPTR \\ \>\>END SUBROUTINE \\ \>\>SUBROUTINE MPI\_ALLOC\_MEM\_CPTR(SIZE, INFO, BASEPTR, IERROR) \\ \>\>\>USE, INTRINSIC :: ISO\_C\_BINDING, ONLY : C\_PTR \\ \>\>\>IMPORT :: MPI\_ADDRESS\_KIND \\ \>\>\>INTEGER :: INFO, IERROR \\ \>\>\>INTEGER(KIND=MPI\_ADDRESS\_KIND) :: SIZE \\ \>\>\>TYPE(C\_PTR) :: BASEPTR \\ \>\>END SUBROUTINE \\ \>END INTERFACE
